lyrics:
25 contributorsego brain lyricsverse 1 serj tankian  daron malakian
life is but a dream
drifting on a stream a stream
consciously it seems
all of what remains

prechorus serj tankian  daron malakian
ego brain man made shame
shame love after it rains

chorus serj tankian  daron malakian
you see my pain is real watch my world dissolve
and pretend that none of us see the fall
as i turn to sand you took me by the hand
and declared that love prevails over all

verse 2 serj tankian  daron malakian
i am just a man
fighting other men for land for land
while i turn to sand
in spite of the pain

prechorus serj tankian  daron malakian
ego brain man made shame
shame love after it rains
see system of a down liveget tickets as low as 600you might also likechorus serj tankian  daron malakian
you see my pain is real watch my world dissolve
and pretend that none of us see the fall
as i turn to sand you took me by the hand
and declared that love prevails over all

shame love after it rains

chorus serj tankian  daron malakian

and pretend that none of us see the fall
